name: Hardmode ON
description:
"Hardmode ON" is a hard-core runner for really tough guys!
Features:
- One-touch control: just tap anywhere!
- Pixel-art graphics: try to find all emotions on 8x8 pixel face!
- Time killer. Really. Try it!
- Random generated traps... Oh, man, I died again!
- Addiction! Try to reach "Hardmode"! If you reach, just play more, more, MORE!
